settings.text:
At Unceil, you can pay easily and securely with :‍

  • Credit card (MasterCard and Visa)
  • Maestro (Netherlands and Belgium)
  • Klarna - Postpay (Netherlands)
  • PayPal


The prices of the articles on our website include VAT.


Your encrypted payment is sent via a secure line. To ensure that your data is secured during the ordering and payment process, Secure Locket Layer (SSL) is used. This makes the information unreadable for third parties. A web page is protected if you see the 'lock' at the top of your screen - in the web browser - and if there is an 's' after 'http' in the address bar.

settings.title: Mastercard/Visa
settings.text: With Mastercard or Visa you can pay online with your credit card. Your credit card details are sent securely (locked) via an SSL-secured server. We also support the 3D-Secure and SecureCode technology that makes the online payment process with credit card even more secure. If you have activated 3D-Secure on your credit card, you will be asked - before payment - to confirm your identity via an electronic signature. This protects you against misuse of your credit card number.

settings.title: Maestro
settings.text:
If you have a bank account in Belgium, you can pay online with Maestro in the familiar environment of your bank. Online payment with your Maestro card is currently possible via KBC, CBC, Dexia, Fintro, Fortis and Centea. Online payment with Maestro is secured by means of verification. Depending on the bank you are affiliated with, verification takes place by means of a card reader, a password or another method. If you don't already have a verification method, contact your bank so they can help you with this.

‍

settings.title: Klarna
settings.text: With the payment method Klarna you can place an order and you only have to pay once you have received the products. When your order is approved by Klarna, you will receive an invoice from Klarna with a payment term of 14 days. There is no surcharge for paying via Klarna. You can find more information in Klarna's terms of use . General information about Klarna can be found here . Your personal data will be processed by Klarna in accordance with the applicable data protection law and as described in Klarna's privacy statement.

settings.title: PayPal
settings.text: With PayPal you can pay online with your PayPal account. In order to use PayPal, you must log in with your email address and password. You pay with your bank account, credit card or your PayPal account (where you place credit in advance).
Questions? Send us an email or contact us.
